biography.name: Maroš Beťko
biography.headline: Full-stack developer and game designer
biography.summary: I'm studying Informatics and Design on Masaryk University in Brno. Game development is one of my biggest passions. In my free time I try to develop my skills in this field, ranging from coding to art development. I have an ongoing game project that I like to develop and expand, and try new ideas on. I like challenges that require creative thinking and solving them inspires and motivates me. I'm thorough and organized and hate shoddy quality work and that is what I want my work to reflect.

skills.description: My two most preferred languages are C++ and C#. Profesionally I've been developing mostly in C# and TypeScript and previously also in Swift. I also have experience with Unity engine, which I use for development in school and hobby projects.

During my studies at Masaryk University I attended many design classes where I have worked on small projects in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign. I have also created a complete pixel font, and pixel art for projects I have worked on in my spare time.
I use Git daily and also have experience with various git workflows I used either in work or in group projects at school. I also used TFS (but I would rather not any more).
